column4: hi. i'm trying to set the default volume at boot.  can someone look at my rc.local? it still keeps reverting to max each time. http://pastebin.com/pVKTDZRR
I am guessing that nice gui called 'sound preferences' is not going to do it for you?
adjusting sound volume isn't the problem.  it keeps reverting to max when i reboot and scares the crap out of me
it also should set the default level
